PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-01962024-03-01PSPC
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectAdjustment of Certain Fees in Respect of Publication in the Canada Gazette for the 2019–2020 and 2020–2021 Fiscal Years Remission Order
PrecisADJUSTEMENT OF CERTAIN FEES IN RESPECT OF PUBLICATION IN THE CANADA GAZETTE FOR THE 2019-2020 AND 2020-2021 FISCAL YEARS REMISSION ORDER in order to remit the annually adjusted amounts by the Consumer Price Index to the Canada Gazette insertion fees that were not charges to external clients.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: ADJUSTEMENT OF CERTAIN FEES IN RESPECT OF PUBLICATION IN THE CANADA GAZETTE FOR THE 2019-2020 AND 2020-2021 FISCAL YEARS REMISSION ORDER in order to remit the annually adjusted amounts by the Consumer Price Index to the Canada Gazette insertion fees that were not charges to external clients.
